results.name: default/wordpress-7cdb8c4694-xcfjr

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: default/wordpress-svc

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-7cdb8c4694-xcfjr], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service doesn't have any ready endpoints because the pod 'wordpress-7cdb8c4694-xcfjr' isn't ready, but 1 is expected.

Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs wordpress-7cdb8c4694-xcfjr`. 3. Verify readiness probe configuration. 4. Ensure all dependencies are running.
